이전:효과 위:인덱스 다음:효과

4-서버 제어 버튼
 L2J server related actions are here: settings, multipliers, cache.
4-1Reload and others.
Reload: Tries to reload the specified instance manager. Possible values are: multisell,skill,npc,htm,item,instancemanager,npcwalkers.
HTM 갱신: Flushes HTM cache.
파일 갱신: Flush cache for specified HTM file.
스킬 테스트: Much like //effect, receives an skill ID as parameter, affects target, or caster.
저주받은 무기 갱신: Reloads Cursed Weapon manager.
존 갱신: Reloads zone manager.
Reload Crest: Rebuilds crest cache.
Crest Fix: Converts old crest files if found.
텔레포트 갱신: Reload teleport destinations.
Social: Make characters play social animations. Quickbox can contain socialid, (opt.) player name and (opt.) radius. If only one parameter is supplied, affects target.
전체 문 열기/닫기: Open or close all every door in the server.
존 체크: Performs zone checks on demand.
4-2 지오데이터.
(those who know what they do, also know which one is valid)
4-3 개발.
FightCalc: Initiate dialos for fight calculation between two mobs. Packet Forge: Starts packet crafting facilities.
시스템 메시지: Sends the specified system message to you.
4-4 유지.
상태: Display server stats about memory usage, tasks, etc.
로그인: Display information and options related to the login server.
셧다운: Display restart/shutdown server related actions.
